summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to taxation for transportation purposes; imposing an employee hours tax; adding a new Chapter 5.37 to Title 5 of the Seattle Municipal Code; and amending SMC sections 5.30.010, 5.55.010, 5.55.040 A, 5.55.060 A, 5.55.150 E, 5.55.165, 5.55.220 A and B, 5.55.230 A, and 3.02.125 A in connection therewith.
